description: Four storey block with basement car park for 33 cars and bicycle parking (Block D) and four storey block (Block E) comprising 92 flats (32 studio/ 28 one bedroom/ 13 two bedroom/ 19 three bedroom) and 23 surface car parking spaces and formation of vehicular and pedestrian access.
